teachings.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
teachings.practice: Take 5 minutes today to sit in silence and observe your breath.

teachings.quote: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
teachings.practice: Practice honesty today by being truthful in all your communications.

teachings.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
teachings.practice: Notice your thought patterns today. When negative thoughts arise, acknowledge them without judgment.

teachings.quote: You will not be punished for your anger; you will be punished by your anger.
teachings.practice: When anger arises today, pause and take three deep breaths before responding.

teachings.quote: Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
teachings.practice: Practice letting go of a small grudge or frustration today.

teachings.quote: If you light a lamp for someone else, it will also brighten your path.
teachings.practice: Perform one act of kindness today without expecting anything in return.

teachings.quote: The trouble is, you think you have time.
teachings.practice: Focus on being present in each moment today, especially during routine activities.

mindfulness.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
mindfulness.practice: During meals today, focus entirely on the experience of eating.

mindfulness.quote: Nothing can harm you as much as your own thoughts unguarded.
mindfulness.practice: Set three mindfulness bells today to pause and check in with your thoughts.

compassion.quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
compassion.practice: Send loving-kindness to someone you find difficult today.

compassion.quote: Be where you are; otherwise you will miss your life.
compassion.practice: Practice active listening in your conversations today.
